examples: The town is three miles away.
The kangaroo was making mincemeat of him.
Many more businesses are feeling the chill wind of the recession.
The universal language of art is bridging a divide.
Then again, some major thinkers are way ahead of the curve.
words.defineEn: to have an existence or presence
words.defineVi: để có một sự tồn tại hoặc sự hiện diện

examples: That hot guy had a good head on his shoulders.
The hotel had expensive rates during the holiday season.
The group has a new CD in the pipeline.
The police had the situation well in hand.
The theatre company has several new productions in the pipeline for next season.
words.defineEn: to hold, possess, or own an object or a quality
words.defineVi: để giữ, sở hữu, hoặc sở hữu một đối tượng hoặc một chất lượng

examples: Does this pub do lunches?
Does this pub do lunches?
Does the price include tax?
Microprocessors do the calculations in the twinkling of an eye.
The gang did a warehouse and a supermarket.
words.defineEn: to perform an action or activity that is not mentioned by name
words.defineVi: để thực hiện một hành động hoặc hoạt động không được đề cập theo tên

examples: 95 per cent of the UK can now get superfast broadband.
This room gets very little sunshine.
Get a load of that dress Mag!
Get a load of George over there.
The police got wind of the illegal drug deal.
words.defineEn: to receive or come to have something
words.defineVi: để nhận hoặc đến để có một cái gì đó

examples: The professor knew his subject from the ground up.
I know my stuff.
I know this town like the back of my hand.
No one knows the answer.
She knows the score.
words.defineEn: to have some type of information about something or to be aware of something
words.defineVi: để có một số loại thông tin về một cái gì đó hoặc để nhận thức được một cái gì đó

examples: The Siemens display goes the whole hog.
The cruise went very quickly.
My laptop went haywire
To go swimming/fishing/jogging.
The email went to everyone in the company.
words.defineEn: to travel or move from one location to another location
words.defineVi: để đi du lịch hoặc di chuyển từ một địa điểm đến một địa điểm khác

examples: The incident says an awful lot about his character.
The clock says ten past two.
His angry glance said it all.
To say a prayer.
The clock said three o'clock.
words.defineEn: to use words and our voice to show what we are thinking or feeling
words.defineVi: để sử dụng các từ và giọng nói của chúng tôi để hiển thị những gì chúng tôi đang suy nghĩ hoặc cảm thấy

examples: The professor made mincemeat of the speaker at the conference.
The kangaroo was making mincemeat of him.
A couple of years in the army should make a man of him.
Good wine can make a meal.
The news really made my day.
words.defineEn: to form, produce, or prepare something, by putting parts together or by combining materials
words.defineVi: để hình thành, sản xuất hoặc chuẩn bị một cái gì đó, bằng cách đặt các bộ phận lại với nhau hoặc bằng cách kết hợp các vật liệu

examples: We thought the world of our teacher, Mr. Johnson.
He thought like a general.
Many people thought that the Internet would toll the death knell for newspapers.
Politicians think they can easily lead people by the nose.
She really thinks on her feet well.
words.defineEn: to have a type of belief, idea, or opinion about a person or thing
words.defineVi: để có một loại niềm tin, ý tưởng, hoặc quan điểm về một người hoặc điều

examples: See full dictionary entry for heart.
See my car?
This stadium has seen many thrilling football games.
The twentieth century saw dramatic changes in most areas of life.
Our car has seen better days!
words.defineEn: to notice a thing or person with our eyes
words.defineVi: để ý một điều hoặc người với đôi mắt của chúng tôi

examples: you want a knuckle sandwich?
We want a deal.
I want a new job.
To want children/kids.
I want a dish of creamy mushroom bucatini with Parmesan right now.
words.defineEn: to wish to do or have something
words.defineVi: muốn làm hoặc có một cái gì đó

examples: Take your pick.
His new world record will take some beating.
His apology took the edge off her anger.
Things like this take time.
The river took a meandering bend through the picturesque valley.
words.defineEn: to reach for something and hold it
words.defineVi: để đạt được cho một cái gì đó và giữ nó

examples: The girls looked so pretty in their summer dresses.
The food looks good.
The garden looks nice.
Her father looked unhappy.
The house looks east.
words.defineEn: to turn our eyes toward a person or thing that we want to see
words.defineVi: để hướng mắt về phía một người hoặc vật mà chúng ta muốn nhìn thấy

examples: My vegetarian friend often uses beans as a filling for vegetarian tacos.
The poem uses simple language.
The chef used a secret blend of herbs and spices as the seasoning for the famous fried chicken.
The chef used juniper berries as a key ingredient in her signature marinade for the grilled meat.
The adventurer used the tail fat as a survival resource during their journey in the wilderness.
words.defineEn: to employ a particular thing or do something with an object, method, etc. to achieve a specific result
words.defineVi: để sử dụng một điều cụ thể hoặc làm điều gì đó với một đối tượng, phương pháp, vv để đạt được một kết quả cụ thể

examples: I let the spare room.
Let A and B stand for X and Y respectively.
They let loose a couple of rounds of ammunition.
This lets more water into the soil.
The app lets you share your photos on Facebook, Twitter, and Tumblr.
words.defineEn: to allow something to happen or someone to do something
words.defineVi: để cho phép một cái gì đó xảy ra hoặc ai đó để làm một cái gì đó

examples: His family comes first.
Knowledge of cooking comes easy to him.
Come rain or shine.
After dinner comes the reckoning.
All good things come to an end.
words.defineEn: to move or travel toward something or someone
words.defineVi: để di chuyển hoặc đi về phía một cái gì đó hoặc một ai đó

examples: The soup needs a little more seasoning.
This shirt needs washing.
My father's car needs an oil change.
I need a lightweight sweater for the spring season.
We need a new brush for our pet's fur.
words.defineEn: to want something or someone that we must have if we want to do or be something
words.defineVi: muốn một cái gì đó hoặc một ai đó mà chúng ta phải có nếu chúng ta muốn làm hoặc trở thành một cái gì đó

examples: Lower energy consumption means less pollution.
Her children mean the world to her.
Your friendship means a great deal to me.
They mean no harm.
They mean no harm.
words.defineEn: to have a particular meaning or represent something
words.defineVi: để có một ý nghĩa cụ thể hoặc đại diện cho một cái gì đó

examples: A touch of maple extract in the pancake batter gives them a delightful maple syrup taste.
The finance minister's fall from grace gave his enemies great satisfaction.
Give sweetsop a try!
The morgue gives me the jitters.
This old house gives me the willies.
words.defineEn: to offer a thing to a person
words.defineVi: để cung cấp một điều cho một người

examples: What time does the show start?
Start the engines!
The school semester starts next month.
Who started the fire?
The trail starts just outside the town.
words.defineEn: to begin doing or using something that we were not doing or using before, and continue doing or using it
words.defineVi: để bắt đầu làm hoặc sử dụng một cái gì đó mà chúng tôi đã không làm hoặc sử dụng trước đó và tiếp tục làm hoặc sử dụng nó

examples: I tried a new coffee blend with hints of chocolate and caramel.
Try some dried apricots as a healthy snack.
Give sweetsop a try!
Have you tried this new coffee?
The case was tried before a jury.
words.defineEn: to make an effort or attempt to do or have something
words.defineVi: để thực hiện một nỗ lực hoặc cố gắng để làm hoặc có một cái gì đó

examples: The students worked their heart and soul on their project.
Not working my foot.
Soymilk works well as a substitute for milk in sauces and creamy pasta dishes.
My dad works forty hours a week.
To work clay.
words.defineEn: to do certain physical or mental activities in order to achieve a result or as a part of our job
words.defineVi: để làm một số hoạt động thể chất hoặc tinh thần để đạt được một kết quả hoặc là một phần của công việc của chúng tôi

examples: My wife talked sense into me.
Your friend really talks a blue streak!
The two men talked.
A true leader walks the talk.
He talked a blue streak all through breakfast.
words.defineEn: to tell someone about the information, feelings, or ideas that we have
words.defineVi: để nói với ai đó về thông tin, cảm xúc hoặc ý tưởng mà chúng tôi có

examples: Many more businesses are feeling the chill wind of the recession.
He felt the weight of the heavy burden on his shoulders.
She felt a sharp pain in her hand.
We all felt the force of her arguments.
The wool feels soft.
words.defineEn: to experience or be aware of an emotion
words.defineVi: để trải nghiệm hoặc nhận thức được một cảm xúc

examples: The figures tell a different story.
To tell stories/jokes/lies.
She again told tales out of school.
Do tell me!
Tell me in words of one syllable!
words.defineEn: to use words and give someone information
words.defineVi: để sử dụng các từ và cung cấp cho ai đó thông tin
